title: Heidi Klum, 46, and husband Tom Kaulitz, 30, kiss during an outdoor party in LA
text:
Heidi Klum and Tom Kaulitz were the picture of newlywed bliss as they shared multiple kisses in a series of Instagram Story videos.

The images were taken from a pal's backyard pool party.

The 46-year-old TV star wore a white button-up blouse with thick black stripes and a pair of aviator sunglasses.

Lovebirds: Heidi Klum and Tom Kaulitz were the picture of newlywed bliss as they shared multiple kisses in a series of Instagram Story videos Heidi posted from a pal's backyard pool party

Happy Heidi: Here she looked into the camera while modeling her sunglasses

She had fun with various filters in the Story, including a time-lapse of the two planting pecks on one another as well as another with floating hearts.

The model turned TV personality also shared video of a picturesque pool and a moon bouncer with guests dancing around it.

And on Instagram Heidi shared a clip of them dancing: 'Love dancing with you,' she captioned the video.

Klum and Kaulitz walked down the aisle in early August after filing a marriage license at the LA courthouse in private.

Sweet: She had fun with various filters in the Story, including a time-lapse of the two planting pecks on one another as well as another with floating hearts

The supermodel and Tokio Hotel musician were spotted together in public in Cannes in 2018.

She sloughed criticism for dating a man 17 years younger than her at the time.

'Lately, I’m being reminded more about my age by people other than myself,' Heidi told InStyle.

The scene: The model turned TV personality also shared video of a picturesque pool and a moon bouncer with guests dancing around it

Made in the shade: People hovered under the umbrellas as it was very hot

She continued: 'My boyfriend is many years younger than me, and lots of people are questioning that and asking about it.

'That's really the only time when age seems to be shoved in my face and I have to give an answer for it. I don't really think about it that much otherwise.

'You have to just live a happy life without worrying too much about what people think because worrying is only going to give you more wrinkles.'

Love: Klum and Kaulitz walked down the aisle in early August after filing a marriage license at the LA courthouse in private

And she told People recently that she feels Tom is a great match for her: 'He enjoys life and is very generous. He’s super kind. I just found my partner finally, you know?'

The model also said that they will be doing a couples costume for Halloween this year: 'He’s really game for anything. We’re very similar that way.'

Heidi was previously wed to British musician Seal from 2005 to 2014, and actor Ric Pipino from 1997 to 2002.

She shares Helene, 15, Henry, 14, Lou, nine, and Johan, 12, with Seal.
description: They were wed in August. And Heidi Klum and Tom Kaulitz were the picture of newlywed bliss as they shared multiple kisses in a series of Instagram Story videos Heidi posted from
